about_the_game: This demo includes World 1 of the game. Please note that this is not the final version, and there are still many features to be added. The demo will be updated as development progresses. We appreciate your feedback and support!

name: AquaDream Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
